isis.stitle: TSI 05-12-18 - Check Ball - Rexroth High-Pressure Oil Pump Repairs

subjectgroup.subject: Check Ball - Rexroth High-Pressure Oil Pump Repairs

geninfo.para: A check ball for the high-pressure oil pump ferry plug is released for service.
A High-Pressure Oil Pump Repair Kit (1842906C92) was released in January 2004. A replacement check ball for the oil ferry plug is not included in the kit.
When repairing the high-pressure oil pump, if the 1/4 inch check ball is damaged or lost, the check ball (1833830C1) is now available as a serviceable part.
Contact your International® Service Parts supplier to order the new oil ferry plug check ball.
